@graph.name: Energy Electrical And Industrial Supplies Pty Ltd
@graph.legalName: Energy Electrical And Industrial Supplies Pty Ltd

logo.caption: Energy Electrical And Industrial Supplies Pty Ltd Logo

@graph.description: Energy Electrical And Industrial Supplies Pty Ltd is a trusted electrical wholesaler and retailer based in Ingleburn, NSW, serving residential, commercial, and industrial customers across Sydney since 1988. We supply a comprehensive range of LED lighting, switches and sockets, cable management, CCTV and security systems, smart home and audio equipment, industrial switchgear and circuit breakers, emergency lighting, ceiling fans, and hardware — with special trade account pricing and Australia-wide online delivery.
@graph.paymentAccepted: Cash, Credit Card, Trade Account, Bank Transfer, Online Payment

itemListElement.name: Electrical Supplies
itemListElement.description: Full range of electrical supplies including switches and sockets, surface outlets, batten lamp holders, cable clips, conduit, and electrical accessories.

itemListElement.name: Industrial Electrical
itemListElement.description: Industrial-grade components including Clipsal 1-pole and 3-pole MCBs, 4.5KA and 6KA circuit breakers, DIN rail devices, and heavy-duty industrial switchgear.

itemListElement.name: Smart Home and Audio
itemListElement.description: Smart home automation, Wi-Fi connected devices, and audio systems.

itemListElement.name: CCTV, Security and Alarm Systems
itemListElement.description: CCTV cameras, Wi-Fi security cameras, alarm systems, and surveillance equipment including EZVIZ smart cameras.

itemListElement.name: Clearance
itemListElement.description: Heavily discounted clearance stock on LED lighting, circuit breakers, ceiling fans, cable clips, and more.

review.reviewBody: Excellent customer service, competitive prices and a great range. The staff were extremely helpful and went out of their way to help me find exactly what I was looking for. Highly recommended!
This is a great place in the neighborhood to get electrical supplies and hardware for your home needs.
Great service and best price, Had the switches ready for pickup when I arrived . Cheers
Very intelligent, trustworthy business owner and business practices. Highly recommended.
Excellent place for electrical supplies. good service and honest prices. will visit again. thanks
Highly recommended. Excellent services and unexpected best prices.
Best service and best prices you don't find elsewhere.

@graph.name: Electrical Wholesale and Retail Supply
@graph.description: Supply of electrical products for all project types — residential, commercial, and industrial. Range covers lighting, data, conduit, switches, outlets, wire and cables, and all accessories. Special in-store and trade account pricing available.

audience.audienceType: Licensed Electricians, Electrical Contractors, Builders, DIY Homeowners, Facility Managers, Property Developers

@graph.name: Trade Account Program
@graph.description: Exclusive trade pricing for licensed electricians, electrical contractors, and builders. Trade accounts unlock special in-store pricing on all purchases. Contact (02) 9829 4844 or sales@energyeis.com.au to apply.

@graph.name: Online Electrical Supplies Store with Australia-Wide Delivery
@graph.description: Shop electrical supplies online at energyeis.com.au with Australia-wide delivery. Browse LED lighting, switchgear, CCTV, smart home, cable management, and clearance products with online ordering, account management, wishlist, and order tracking.

shippingRate.description: Shipping costs are in addition to listed product prices — see delivery and return policy for details

@graph.name: Project Quoting Service
@graph.description: Free quoting service for any electrical supply requirement — from a small residential renovation to a mid-size commercial job to a large industrial project. Contact our experienced team for honest trade advice and a competitive supply quote.

@graph.name: Switch Mechanism White 10A MECH10AWH
@graph.description: Crown 10A white switch mechanism for standard electrical switch installations.

@graph.name: Cable Clip Flat 15mm Pack of 100 — Suits 4mm/6mm TPS Cable
@graph.description: Crown flat cable clips 15mm, pack of 100. Suitable for securing 4mm and 6mm flat TPS electrical cable during installation.

@graph.name: Cable Clip Flat 10mm Pack of 100
@graph.description: Crown flat cable clips 10mm, pack of 100 for TPS cable installation.

@graph.name: Cable Clip Flat 12mm Pack of 100 — Suits 1.5mm² TPS Cable
@graph.description: Crown flat cable clips 12mm, pack of 100. Suitable for securing 1.5mm² flat TPS cable.

@graph.name: Cable Clip Flat 14mm Pack of 100 — Suits 2.5mm TPS Cable
@graph.description: Crown flat cable clips 14mm, pack of 100. Suitable for securing 2.5mm flat TPS cable.

@graph.name: B22 Batten Lamp Holder White CY209
@graph.description: Crown B22 bayonet socket batten lamp holder in white. 100W 250V rated, 70mm diameter x 92mm height. Made from high quality material. Approved to Australian Standard AS 61184.

@graph.name: Clipsal 25A 4.5KA Resi Max 1 Pole Circuit Breaker MCB4-125
@graph.description: Clipsal 25A 4.5KA single-pole miniature circuit breaker from the Resi Max range. Features self-extinguishing housing, lift-up terminals with combination head screws, 18mm compact module, white finish. Green strip provides visual safety confirmation of contact opening. Includes ON/OFF markings in contrasting colours.

@graph.name: Double Surface Socket Outlet 10A Twin Plug Base 414-WE Type
@graph.description: ONELEC double surface-mount socket outlet, 10A 250VAC, 3-pin, 2-gang white. Surface mounting type, 72mm x 65mm x 63mm. Suitable for residential and commercial surface wiring applications.

@graph.name: Sonar 12W Tricolour LED Wall Bunker Light with PIR Sensor Matt Black MLXS34510MS
@graph.description: Martec Sonar 12W tricolour LED wall bunker light in matt black with built-in PIR sensor. IP44 rated, 180° detection angle, up to 12m detection distance, adjustable time delay (10s to 4min), adjustable sensitivity. Tri-colour CCT 3000K/4000K/5000K, 700–800lm output. UV-resistant polycarbonate and polypropylene housing, 240V AC, 2-year warranty. Dimensions: 240mm x 113mm x 74mm.

@graph.name: Clipsal 10A 6KA Max 3 Pole Circuit Breaker 4CB310/6
@graph.description: Clipsal 10A 6KA 3-pole miniature circuit breaker from the Max range. Self-extinguishing housing, lift-up terminals, compact module dimensions, white finish. Green strip guarantees physical contact opening for safe downstream circuit work. Features ON/OFF contrasting colour markings.

@graph.name: Clipsal 16A 6KA Max 3 Pole Circuit Breaker 4CB316/6
@graph.description: Clipsal 16A 6KA 3-pole miniature circuit breaker from the Max range. Self-extinguishing housing, lift-up terminals, compact standardised module dimensions, white finish. Green strip for safe downstream circuit isolation.

@graph.name: Ranger 12W Tricolour LED Security Light Single Black MLXR3451M
@graph.description: Martec Ranger 12W tricolour LED security light in black, without sensor. Modern design with fully adjustable head for wall or ceiling mounting. Ideal for entrances, alfresco, garages, and walkways. UV-stabilised plastic housing with quick-connect base. Switchable colour temperature 3000K/4000K/5000K.

@graph.name: Ranger 12W Tricolour LED Security Light with Sensor Black MLXR3451MS
@graph.description: Martec Ranger 12W tricolour LED security light in black with sensor. Fully adjustable head for wall or ceiling mounting. Adjustable time delay, lux level, and sensitivity. Manual override function, quick-connect base for fast installation. Switchable colour temperature 3000K/4000K/5000K. Ideal for entrances, alfresco, garages, and exterior walkways.

@graph.name: Frameless LED Panel Downlight 36W Tri-Colour CCT Adjustable 70–205mm CE.FR20-36
@graph.description: Cerian frameless recessed LED panel downlight 36W with tri-colour CCT (3000K/4000K/6500K). Unique adjustable spring design fits cut-outs from 70mm to 205mm — ideal for replacing existing downlights without cutting new holes. 180° beam angle, flicker-free, IP20. Isolated Lifud driver, Australian standard approved. Dimmable options: trailing edge, 1-10V, DALI/DSI. 3-year warranty. Suitable for offices, hospitals, restaurants, hotels, retail, shopping centres, and residential.

@graph.name: Weatherproof LED Batten 18W 600mm Tri-Colour CCT IP65 with Sensor TLWB34620s
@graph.description: Martec IP65 weatherproof LED batten 18W 600mm (2ft) with microwave sensor. Tri-colour CCT switchable 3000K/4000K/6500K. IK06 impact-rated polycarbonate housing and diffuser with stainless steel clips. Available in 600mm and 1200mm with microwave sensor option. Ideal for residential and commercial corridors, walkways, and exterior areas.

@graph.name: Clevertronics Lifelight Recessed Emergency LED Light D40 Classification ELIFE-X-LI
@graph.description: Clevertronics Lifelight recessed emergency LED light with D40 emergency classification. Market-leading lithium battery technology with energy-efficient LEDs for lower maintenance and energy costs. Sleek architectural design. Suitable for offices, hospitals, schools, shopping centres, and commercial buildings. The first LED emergency light on the market.

@graph.name: DEKA EVOII 36" 75W Ceiling Fan Black with 18W CCT Tricolour LED Dimmable Light
@graph.description: DEKA EVOII 36-inch ceiling fan in black with integrated 18W CCT tricolour LED dimmable light. High-grade UV-stabilised corrosion-resistant ABS construction. Suitable for raked/sloping ceilings up to 18° pitch. Reversible airflow for year-round comfort — cooling in summer, warming in winter. Quick-fix connectors for easy installation. 6-year warranty (2 years in-home service + 4 years parts). Suitable for indoor and covered outdoor areas.

@graph.name: EZVIZ LC3 2K Outdoor Wi-Fi Smart Security Wall-Light Camera
@graph.description: EZVIZ LC3 2K outdoor Wi-Fi smart security wall-light camera. 4MP 2560×1440 resolution, 157° diagonal viewing angle, 140° horizontal, IP65 weatherproof. AI-powered human detection, two-way talk with built-in microphone and speaker, 32GB built-in eMMC storage plus EZVIZ cloud storage. Dual-antenna 802.11 b/g/n 2.4GHz Wi-Fi. Integrated 700 lumen SMD LED with adjustable brightness, 3000K colour temperature. Working temperature -30°C to 50°C. Certifications: CE/RoHS/REACH/WEEE.

@graph.name: 200W LED Floodlight IP65 Tricolour Martec MLXO345200M
@graph.description: Martec 200W IP65 tricolour LED floodlight. Switchable colour temperature 3000K/4000K/5000K. Aluminium housing with tempered glass, stainless steel angled bracket. Pre-wired with 600mm flex and plug. Ideal for security lighting, entrances, alfresco, and exterior applications requiring high-output illumination.

@graph.name: How to Source Electrical Supplies for Your Project
@graph.description: Step-by-step guide to purchasing electrical supplies from Energy EIS for residential, commercial, or industrial projects.

step.name: Identify your project requirements
step.text: Determine whether your project is residential, commercial, or industrial. Compile a list of the electrical products needed — lighting type, cable sizes, switchgear ratings, conduit, and any specialised industrial or emergency lighting components.

step.name: Browse online or contact for a free quote
step.text: Browse our full catalogue at energyeis.com.au or call (02) 9829 4844. Our team provides honest trade advice and will quote for any project size — from a residential renovation to a large industrial job.

step.name: Set up a trade account for wholesale pricing
step.text: Licensed electricians, contractors, and builders can apply for a trade account by contacting us on (02) 9829 4844 or sales@energyeis.com.au to unlock special in-store pricing on all purchases.

step.name: Visit in-store or order online
step.text: Visit us at Unit 1/2 Stennett Road, Ingleburn NSW 2565, Monday to Friday 6:15am–4:30pm, or order online at energyeis.com.au for Australia-wide delivery.

step.name: Check our clearance section for extra savings
step.text: Visit energyeis.com.au/products/clearance for heavily discounted electrical stock. Current clearance deals include LED lighting, Clipsal circuit breakers, ceiling fans, cable clips, and security cameras at up to 60% off.

mainEntity.name: Where is Energy Electrical And Industrial Supplies located?

acceptedAnswer.text: Energy EIS is located at Unit 1/2 Stennett Road, Ingleburn, NSW 2565. Open Monday to Friday 6:15am–4:30pm. Call (02) 9829 4844 or email sales@energyeis.com.au. Shop online at energyeis.com.au for Australia-wide delivery.
Energy EIS is open Monday to Friday from 6:15am to 4:30pm. We are closed on weekends. Our online store at energyeis.com.au is available 24/7 with Australia-wide delivery.

mainEntity.name: Do you offer trade accounts or wholesale pricing?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes. Energy EIS offers special trade pricing for licensed electricians, electrical contractors, and builders. Trade accounts provide exclusive in-store pricing on all purchases. Contact (02) 9829 4844 or sales@energyeis.com.au to set up your trade account.

Energy EIS stocks leading brands including Clipsal (switchgear, MCBs, circuit breakers), Martec (LED battens, floodlights, security lights, wall bunkers), Clevertronics (emergency lighting), DEKA (ceiling fans with LED), EZVIZ (smart security cameras), Cerian (frameless LED downlights), Crown (lamp holders, cable clips, switch mechanisms), and ONELEC (surface socket outlets).

mainEntity.name: What types of projects do you supply?

acceptedAnswer.text: Energy EIS supplies everything from small residential renovations to mid-size commercial fitouts and large industrial projects. We stock products for all scales and will gladly quote and supply your full electrical requirements.

mainEntity.name: Do you sell CCTV and security cameras?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes. We stock CCTV cameras, outdoor Wi-Fi smart security cameras, alarm systems, and surveillance equipment. Our EZVIZ LC3 2K camera features AI-powered human detection, 4MP 2560×1440 resolution, IP65 weatherproofing, two-way talk, 32GB built-in storage, and dual-antenna Wi-Fi — available for $81.80.

mainEntity.name: Do you stock Clipsal circuit breakers and MCBs?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes. We stock Clipsal MCBs including 1-pole 4.5KA Resi Max models and 3-pole 6KA Max models in various amp ratings (10A, 16A, 25A). Clearance prices start from $3.09 for single-pole units and $22.26 for 3-pole units.

mainEntity.name: What LED lighting products do you carry?

acceptedAnswer.text: We carry a wide LED range: frameless adjustable downlights (70–205mm cut-out, 36W), IP65 weatherproof battens with microwave sensors, Sonar wall bunker lights with PIR (IP44, 180° detection, 12m range), Ranger adjustable security floodlights, 200W IP65 floodlights, recessed emergency lights (D40 classification), and ceiling fans with integrated tricolour LED.

mainEntity.name: Do you stock emergency lighting compliant with Australian standards?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes. We supply Clevertronics Lifelight recessed emergency LED lights with D40 classification. These are suitable for commercial buildings requiring compliance. We also stock Crown B22 batten lamp holders approved to Australian Standard AS 61184. Contact us for advice on your specific emergency lighting compliance requirements.

mainEntity.name: What cable clips and conduit products do you stock?

acceptedAnswer.text: We stock Crown flat cable clips in 10mm, 12mm, 14mm, and 15mm sizes (packs of 100), designed for specific TPS cable sizes: 10mm for general use, 12mm for 1.5mm² TPS, 14mm for 2.5mm TPS, and 15mm for 4mm/6mm TPS cable. Clearance prices start from $1.00 per pack of 100.

mainEntity.name: Can I buy electrical supplies online from Energy EIS?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes. Shop online at energyeis.com.au with Australia-wide delivery. Create an account to track orders and save favourites. Shipping costs are in addition to listed prices. Visit our delivery and returns policy page for full details.

mainEntity.name: Do you have clearance or sale products?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes. Energy EIS runs an ongoing Stock Clearance Sale with up to 60% off selected lines. Current deals include Clipsal MCBs from $3.09, LED wall bunker lights from $16.98, cable clips from $1.00/pack, ceiling fans from $71.80, and 200W floodlights at $163.62. Visit energyeis.com.au/products/clearance for all current deals.

mainEntity.name: How long has Energy EIS been operating?

acceptedAnswer.text: Energy Electrical And Industrial Supplies has been serving customers since 1988 — over 35 years of experience as an electrical wholesaler and retailer in Ingleburn, NSW. Our team provides honest, experienced trade advice alongside competitive pricing.

mainEntity.name: What areas in Sydney do you serve?

acceptedAnswer.text: Energy EIS is based in Ingleburn and conveniently serves Campbelltown, Liverpool, Fairfield, Bankstown, Parramatta, Penrith, Minto, and all of Greater Western Sydney and the Macarthur Region. Australia-wide delivery is available via our online store.

mainEntity.name: What ceiling fans do you stock?

acceptedAnswer.text: We stock the DEKA EVOII 36-inch ceiling fan in black with 18W CCT tricolour dimmable LED, suitable for both indoor and covered outdoor areas including raked ceilings up to 18°. It features reversible airflow and comes with a 6-year warranty. Currently on clearance for $71.80 (was $121.80).
